title: Violated
text: I was staying at a highly rated Airbnb. My room was broken into, my debit card was stolen, my keys were taken and used to gain access to my vehicle in the driveway, he cut a hole into my brand new subwoofer and went through my trunk. I paid a great deal of money for that room that I felt so violated in so now I‚Äôm spending even more money to stay in a hotel. I should not of had to feel so uncomfortable and unsafe that I had to leave. $1500 to get robbed and vandalized and end up in an even unsafer environment and pay almost double what I paid there. Worst experience from being hospitality

title: Scam
text: I am 22 and at first it was asking for id verification so I did and it was taking forever to load so I clicked out and looked at another house hoping it load faster and it did so it charged me for 2 places one I was fine cause I was using the airbnb service and the other house that it was taking forever to verify that I canceled took the $300 and was never able to get it back all they could do was credit me $112 and now I‚Äôm trying to book another airbnb for my church youth group it‚Äôs not allowing me to because it‚Äôs a safety hazard and want me to book a hotel room or a private room due to ‚Äúa party could happen‚Äù but it‚Äôs just 5 of us and I can‚Äôt even use the $112 credit on something I want. The help service will send you msgs as well and ask if you need help but will also close the case right after sending the msg so there was no way I could ask what I need to get fixed and I called and said it was up to the hostess and the host texted me saying he can‚Äôt due to the strict policy they have on non refund so with that being said airbnb and hostess quick to take your money even if you arnt using their service and if it didn‚Äôt verify but verify with another house !!

title: Rip off app that helps hosts to steal customers money!
text: I had to cancel my 16 day airbnb stay for $6k due to an emergency. I contacted the app‚Äôs support to get money reimbursement, where I was told the host had ‚Äústrict‚Äù policies and they can‚Äôt do anything about it. They advices me to reach out the host. While the host told me to contact the airbnb support. They were playing a game with me, where they just referred me to each other and one wanted to take a responsibility. The support just kept closing my case. They could have returned me at least 50% of the sum as I rent for a long time. Never ever in my life I use airnbnb or any other rental apps alike.

title: Mixed Experiences
text: I no longer use Airbnb unless there‚Äôs a significant value advantage versus a local hotel. I have had too many mixed experiences or plainly poor experiences. Also all the fees seem absurd. The only times I stay now are for unique places that don‚Äôt overcharge (very rare) or for large group stays.

title: No care for guest well being or safety
text: Record snow storm hit the day we were suppose to arrive and the town was completely compromised by the snow. Nobody could get in or out for the next two weeks. Because my family foresaw this and chose not to go because our own well being and safety is more important Airbnb would not back us up on a refund from the terrible hosts we had who also did not care for our well being. Never again will we use Airbnb. A decent hotel would have refunded us no questions asked. Hotels are great!

title: Highest hidden fees in the world
text: If you want to pay double the listed price of every house you look at because of ‚Äúservice fees,‚Äù join Air Bnb! They will also email you every couple months to tell you they‚Äôre ‚Äúupdating their terms of service,‚Äú which will mean that they are, once again, raising their fees. This used to be an amazing lodging alternative, but now I‚Äôd rather just book a hotel and pay a flat rate.

title: Robbery
text: I reserved airbnb for 1 month and i had to cancel, host asked me to cancel and when i did she said she can not find another people and she will not refund me, she had 1 week to find another people. She clearly stated that i had to cancel and airbnb support does not give a d*mn about costumers. I will never use airbnb again and i do not recommend this money stealing system that they support!

title: Not seeing messages in my app
text: I have the current version of the app and while I see a message is there- when I try to read the whole thing it takes me to a blank screen. Yes I‚Äôve restarted my phone recently.

title: Been using airbnb for 6 years, but‚Ä¶.
text: Been using airbnb for 6 years, but you dont really know how it is until you experience a big claim. One of my guests was continuously using the washing machine without telling me that there was error code, until the washing machine gave up and flooded the first floor. This happened on thanksgiving, filed the claim officially on Nov.29,2023, its going to be almost 60 days and until now the claim is not resolved. Aircover (airbnb‚Äôs insurance) don't offer live chat, and no phone number to call. The ONLY communication I get is via email and it‚Äôs very generic without any factual update weekly. Whenever I call the airbnb customer service, I receive a generic response of ‚Äúthis is out of my scope, the specialize team will contact you via email‚Äù, then it goes back to waiting via email again. To those who are hosting, airbnb is not as safe they sound it to be. When your house is ruined, you are on your own and you dont even know for how long. They dont give you an estimate, they just keep repeating saying, ‚Äúsince this is a big claim, our team is still investigating‚Äù - same email everytime. Our house is a mess, our mattress is on the floor because we had to remove all furnitures out of the carpet to remove the carpet that was giving mildew smell already. Our fishes are dying because we had to move them small aquarium that is supposed to be temporary, but they have been in the small aquarium since the incident happened (more than 60 days). Its very disappointing how slow the  claim is being handled and there is no way to contact the aircover via chat or call. I hope airbnb will fix this.

title: More expensive than hotels, lots of hidden costs.
text:
Gone are the days of Airbnb being a cheaper alternative to hotels and motels. 

It is extremely irritating that they hide the real cost until you go to "reserve" a room. For example, I found a room in a local city for $81, where a hotel costs about $150. However, when I went to reserve the room, the price jumped to about $206 because of a $90 cleaning fee, $11 taxes, and $24 in an Airbnb service fee. (If the math is wrong, I was approximating). 

This is absolutely ridiculous. I don‚Äôt want to have to click on every single room possible in order to find the real price. 

This used to be a great service, but right now it‚Äòs a 0/10. 

Check hotels, motels, beds and breakfasts, or other local innkeepers nearby; there‚Äòs a good chance they may be cheaper than Airbnb. 
You‚Äôre also much less likely to be scammed.
My wife has thrice now, picked a room, paid for it, and never heard back from the host. Airbnb refunded her, but it still meant that she was stuck without anywhere to go at nighttime with other places booked out. 

Tl;dr: hidden costs and crazy fees mean that Airbnb is no longer a cost-effective alternative. Coupled with that is the higher risk of scams. Just save yourself a headache, go with a hotel/motel.

title: I do not recommend this company
text: I do not recommend this company they never get back to you when they tell you they will. Then when you call back for the same questions they brush you off and say someone will get back to you and rude about it. To many company‚Äôs out there that have Better customer service.

title: Used to love
text: I used to only use Airbnb for accommodations when traveling. I‚Äôve met some of the nicest hosts this way. But I am shocked to find out that Airbnb is reaping the benefits of homes in Israeli settlements. That means the homes of Palestinians were invaded by Israel and listed on Airbnb. This is a human rights abuse. An outrage. And a real ugly shame. I‚Äôll stay with friends and keep my money in my own community, a community that would stand up for me if MY home were invaded and turned into a bed and breakfast. Shameful.

title: Not worth it anymore
text: They changed everything. As a UX/UI designer I just want to do a simple search. They‚Äôve completed Airbnb searching as well as Airbnb experiences. I don‚Äôt want to be forced to search your way with predefined constraints. You can‚Äôt do a simple test search in Experiences either as we plan Tokyo. Which is why I‚Äôm writing this.

title: Missing Features

title: DONT NOT DOWNLOAD IF BOOKING FOR MORE THAT 5 PEOPLE!!
text: over the past week I‚Äôve had the worst experience with Airbnb. Anyone could possibly imagine!!! first when we book, we see that you can‚Äôt see the exact address, until after booking, which is strange, because you should know where your surroundings are. But we push through and decided to book but when we got sent the address, it was the worst neighborhood possible, and it looked very rundown so we decided to cancel. Then we tried to book a better neighborhood, they did not let us because they thought we were going to have a party which I can understand but that is not the case and then when I tried to get help, the customer service people were extremely helpful, but Airbnb decided to still deny our request and still not let us book but instead give us different links to hotels and private rooms, which I guess can be helpful, but we really had our heart set on a nice Airbnb in the middle of the city instead of booking at some overly expensive hotel now because Airbnb has had us running around it is two days before the event and the people that are trying to book have nothing to fall back on. It is very disappointing that Airbnb has done this, but I can understand where they‚Äôre coming from but I also cannot because they made us run around and said that an ID wasn‚Äôt valid and wouldn‚Äôt let us pay and kept canceling and even when we tried to book on somebody else‚Äôs phone it canceled that too so I‚Äôm just overall disappointed with the entire experience and I probably won‚Äôt be booking with Airbnb ever again. but on the other hand, the hosts were very helpful, and even they had no clue why Airbnb wouldn‚Äôt help us.

title: Fees Are Out Of Control

title: Stole my money and canceled my trip
text: My children and I were on our way to our annual Myrtle Beach family vacation. The trip was booked and we got our itinerary sent to our email. I woke up the next day with an email stating that our trip was canceled when I called they said they had no record. I gave them the itinerary number and sent them a screenshot of the money being taken out of my account. I fought for two months, because not only did they take the money out of my account they canceled my trip and said they had no record of it even with the proof that I had, they still said that they did not see it, this is not the first time that I heard they have done this now I actually see what people have been through. I heard about VRBO and not only was it easy I saw the same house and it was cheaper. My whole family uses VRBO now. The bank ended up, refunding me my money back after showing all of my proof.

title: Checkin window and inquiry message miscommunication
text:
Both host and quest needs to be aware of the Checkin window as an important and urgent request for the guest since some guest cannot book without inquiring first if the host can accommodate their requested Checkin window. If the guest did not mentioned anything about Checkin window in their inbox and Airbnb feature assume the host will see the Checkin requested time in the inquiry is earlier than the guest requested this can later cause disappointment and cancellation of the host cannot accommodate the guest in the time requested. TheCheckin window feature alone is not sufficient to call to the host attention since we are mainly looking at the guest profile and their inquiry message to accept their booking. To place attention on Checkin window please improve the feature to call to action that the guest wants to come earlier than the expected and ask if we can allow it! Assuming we see take note of all the reservations details I‚Äôd a false assumption if the guest inquiry message is requesting something or more importance. Please help us to know what is more important to the guest by encouraging guest to communicate and specifically request what they need . This caused upset many times and cancellation loosing customers business It‚Äôs quite annoying to click X each time I leave a review to dismiss the refer a host dialogue

Please address the host policy or house rules to the guest  as an important feature so that each guest knows they need to follow the house rules or their will be consequences such as termination or the stay or damage/smoking  fee‚Äôs charge . It‚Äôs annoying each time a guest smoked especially in cold weather to file a claim for additional cleaning due to smoke remnants in the home or even damages.

title: Airbnb SCAM

title: Don‚Äôt let Covid stop you! Go on the vacation!
text: I wish I could leave no stars! Airbnb doesn‚Äôt have a policy in place for people who get sick and can no longer go on their vacation.. I recently booked a trip to PR and of course got Covid a few days before I was set to go on my trip. I canceled my stay thinking I was doing the host a favor by not contaminating her space. Nope, she took my money no refund and never responded to me again with any means of concern or even a get better soon. My stay was $200 maybe, money the host will easily make in the next coming weeks.. very unfortunate Airbnb was no help in the matter.
